flawed_nl_solution:
Addison sold 181 x 2 = <<181*2=632>>632 raffle tickets on Saturday.
She sold 632 on Saturday - 78 on Sunday = <<632-78=554>>554 more on Saturday than Sunday.
#### 554

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 362, not 632. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
